EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading the Cloud-Native Java eBook
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading this excerpt of O’Reilly’s Cloud-Native Java eBook, authored by Pivotal’s Josh Long and Kenny Bastani. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you explore the benefits and promises of a cloud-native platform and a microservices architecture.
Given your interest in this eBook, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- Analyst Report: Gartner’s Market Guide for Application Platforms <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/gartner-market-guide-for-application-platforms]]> - eBook: Cloud Foundry: The Cloud-Native Platform <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-the-cloud-native-platform]]> - White Paper: Supercharging Your Microservices With NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud <[[https://pivotal.io/supercharging-your-microservices-with-netflixoss-and-spring-cloud]]> - Blog: 5 Confessions Of A Platform Builder <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/case-studies/5-confessions-of-a-platform-builder]]> - Video: Help Developers Do What They Love <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdw_9dADM-4]]> - White Paper: The Upside-Down Economics of Building Your Own Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-upside-down-economics-of-building-your-own-platform]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C.
Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
